name: top_ranking
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool top_nft_collections.
Tool description: Provides up-to-date information on the top NFT collections across various networks, including Ethereum, BNB Chain, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, and Solana.
API description: Fetches the top NFT collections from OpenSea based on specified criteria.

sortby.description: Criteria to sort the NFT collections. Default is 'ONE_HOUR_VOLUME'.

time.description: Time period for ranking the collections. Default is 'ONE_HOUR'.

chain.description: Blockchain chain to filter the collections. Default is None.

count.description: Number of collections to retrieve. Default is 100.
